title: Alternatives to TypeShow
content:
Hi,

I've set up the TypeShow web plugin (typeshow.net), which is ok, but doesn't offer a lot of options. Are there any (paid or free) alternatives you know of?

Cheers,  
Jasper
author: 1996type

comments.content:
FontShop has a plug-in, free to download. If you have Adobe CS5 or CS6 you're covered.

Wordpress.org has WF plugins also.

Sorry, I wasn't very clear in the first post. Typeshow is a webplugin for foundries to display their fonts to potential customers. Visitors cana type in any text and choose a font from the foundry to view it in.
Try the suggestions in this thread: [Previewing Fonts on a Website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420070520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Previewing%20Fonts%20on%20a%20Website)
Thanks! Type-applications looks pretty good to me.
